website_summaries.verdict: Amazon has created another smart speaker that brings practical smarts to the kitchen counter or the bedside table. It's not as adventurous a device as other Echo products, but it's one of the most wallet-friendly and practical.
pros: The Echo Dot with Clock brings all the best elements of 2018's third-gen Dot and adds a smart quality-of-life upgrade in the form of an LED clock display
cons: The $60 price tag edges the new Dot out of the super cheap range shared by the standard Dot and Google Nest Mini
Plus, the LED display can't adjust color or color temperature, which makes it a little annoying in a dark room

customer_reviews.title: Great little speaker and now with a clock!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Dot 3rd generation, which I now have stereo paired in my bedroom, and it sounds great!! The addition of the clock is an added bonus, as I will carry it with me when I travel. Plus I bought the battery base for both of them and I can move them around, especially to my kitchen for stereo music when I cook. Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Gutierrez-Victory

customer_reviews.title: Best bedroom Echo option
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to relplace a Gen 1 dot that we had hooked up to an iHome clock radio. The original Dot had terrible sound quality, but it was handy to have in out bedroom hooked up to a clock speaker. So this is a great replacement, the sound quality is close to the clock speaker we have probably because the driver size is similar. The actual microphone array is also way more responsive. This is probably the best nightstand option you can find. I wish there was a way to customize the lighting since the adaptive lighting is not the greatest.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan D.

customer_reviews.title: Broke Immediately - No Response from Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: I love Alexa, and loved this until I unplugged it to move it to another part of the room, and it stopped working. I tried to return it for replacement, but I was guided to a request for support which I filled out and never heard back from. Is all I want is an item that works, and support from Amazon. I no longer have the option on my page to replace the item. It's been less than a month, and only a couple weeks before I sent the original complaint. What are your doing Amazon? Can I get one of these that works?
customer_reviews.author: j lindop

customer_reviews.title: Echo Dot a Dud. Save your money.
customer_reviews.text: I use mine almost exclusive to play Audible audiobooks but since getting this model that is no longer possible. Books start, play one chapter then silence. When I ask Alexa to resume the book it tells me nothing is playing. I have to keep restarting every book every chapter. This has made the whole process in to a chore. I am considering tossing this into the trash and using iTunes to play my ebooks.
customer_reviews.author: G. Merinstein

customer_reviews.title: Clock function is inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! Now, if I could say, “Alexa, mop the floors” I’d think it’s the best invention ever. Seriously though, it’s very convenient, easy to set up and highly versatile. The reason I took away stars was because the clock (which originally worked) randomly switched to a different time. I have trouble shooted all the recommendations and based on that it should be the correct time... but it still isn’t. When I ask the time, it gives me the right time but the display is still wrong. Very frustrating. I should’ve saved money and gotten the one without the clock display.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Meh, amusing but inconsistent and buggy
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is good for its size and the product looks sleek and modern, although personally I find the clock appearance to be clunky. Lots of abilities that our HomePods don't have and setup was very easy. One does feel as though it's always listening in on us which is intrusive and big brotherish, and it will try to upsell you on Amazon services, which is annoying. The audio equivalent of spam. Software is kind of buggy and to can be frustrating to deal with the AI. Decent deal at the sale price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: AmznSux

customer_reviews.title: You can ask anything and setup anything
customer_reviews.text: How did I ever live without this.. now I’m really spoiled. I’m a music lover so this was a big added plus. Has guitar backing tracks . Lights and lamps are now controlled. I think the sound is great plus you can blue tooth to sound board for booming stereo through your PA system or stereo or extra speaker for stereo sound. Perfect fit for amazon music.. you can set it for billions of things. Mine has the clock but always have a backup clock because of power outages with battery or use your phone or tablet . No excuses on late to work . This thing is great.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Kase

customer_reviews.title: Nice added time display feature to the Echo family
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this 4th Amazon Echo device for my daughters room so that she can see the time with the built-in display. Likes: + Seamless integration with our existing “Alexa” infrastructure + Good sound quality from built in speakers + We like that the time or temperature can be seen visually + Love that we can fill rooms throughout the house with same music + Dependable build quality and great service from Amazon devices Dislike: - Because Alexa needs access to Amazon cloud servers to function, we can not depend on this Echo as a stand-alone alarm clock. If power or internet goes out the alarm will not function. Use a separate alarm as backup for times you can not oversleep.
customer_reviews.author: JanTra

customer_reviews.title: Love the clock...HATE the sound! Sounds like it is under a pillow
customer_reviews.text: So this is supposed to be a new and IMPROVED Alexa? I think not. Sure...the clock is handy, but the sound is AWFUL! I played with he EQ for at least 30 minutes. It sounds like someone has a pillow over the speaker! Too much bass and low-mid. No where NEAR enough high end. I have the treble CRANKED and the mis=ds and bass all the way off. Still is muffled. Guess it is going back. I was really loving the fact that I was going to replace my old clock-radio with this...Guess not.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Bear

customer_reviews.title: Marginal sound quality.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted the Dot to use in my bathroom in the morning so that I could glance at the time and change the station without having to dry my hands or get out of the shower. It will change stations okay but the sound quality in a bathroom setting is pretty poor — poor enough to not be able to make out a lot of the radio commentary.
customer_reviews.author: Judith

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good, considering I am an Apple person.
customer_reviews.text: I had a little trouble setting it up. I have 2 speakers (one without clock), 2 Amazon web cams, 4 Blink cameras, 3 Wyze cams, and various Wyze contact sensors, light bulbs, and motion sensors. Surprisingly, I was able to aggregate them all seamlessly into Alexa via my older Amazon Fire tablet. BUt after setting it up, the speakers would not always remember which was the primary one, and sometimes the one without the clock would talk to me instead of the one with the clock. Hopefully all of this has been resolved. Now if I can only figure out how to view all the cams seamlessly in the iPhone Alexa app I should be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Yanagawa

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I have loved all my Alexas. Just to be able to ask it anything about anything and it answers. Play music. Weather. Traffic. News. Turn lights on or off. What ever. It just knows. I Love it. What a great invention. I usually get a new one every couple of years. Why not. There cheap enough and they work great. I can even make phone calls if I needed to. I don’t. But I could. Friggen easy peasy.
customer_reviews.author: F. OH from Mass.

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I tend to be technologically behind and previously had a regular Alexa I only used a couple of times. After a friend kept raving about hers, I plugged my old one in to find the sound had gone bad so I order the 3rd generation. I LOVE it! This one came with a smart plug that I use for lamps. My favorite feature is the lists/reminders. I can create a reminder/list and add to it. Use the app when you're shopping and you can tick off items as you buy them. And I have a monthly reminder for the dog's heartworm/flea prevention. I use it to play music, set timers for cooking and listen to comedy stations. A great deal!
customer_reviews.author: dalgal1

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for My Bedroom
customer_reviews.text: The ultimate clock for the bedside table. Just tell Alexa what time you want to wake up and you are set! Falling asleep difficult? Just tell Alexa to play soothing music for sleep or maybe a nature sound to ease away the stress of the day. I LOVE this!!! The built in clock has digital numerals and it dims when the lights are off so there is no glare. Oh, and when the alarm goes off, it does NOT jolt you from your sleep and you can even tell Alexa to let you snooze a bit if you like. Puts a traditional clock radio into the history books. Fabulous product and I highly recommend it. Easy to use and setup.
customer_reviews.author: Gemma Finds

customer_reviews.title: Voice recognition Hesitation
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Echo Dot with clock to replace my old clock radio. The clock functions very well. Its display adjust to the brightness of the room, which I love. The alarm works just like my other Dot. I can turn off the alarm by telling Alexa to stop or I can press the power button. This device works very well as a count down timer. My only complaint is that there is more hesitation between giving a command and Alexa responding to it than my other Echo Dots and Echo. Perhaps Amazon put a clock in an older Dot that was less responsive and called it 3rd generation. Never the less, I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: David Ebb

customer_reviews.title: Meh...App issues with clock
customer_reviews.text: Wish that I wouldn't have bought it. I'm on my 2nd Echo Dot with clock. The first one, I was unable to see the clock unless the room was totally dark. Turns out it was defective. Amazon sent a replacement and I am able to see the clock now! However, there is a glitch in the app. If you try to adjust brightness or put on auto-brightness, the clock totally disappears and the app won't allow you to change anything until you completely shut down the app and reopen it. Alexa really can't answer anything correctly. This would be good if you're using home automation but just for communicating tasks with her, this is almost useless.
customer_reviews.author: MiMommy77

customer_reviews.title: Great look but has functional issues (in my opinion)
customer_reviews.text: This unit, the Dot w/click, seems to have a hard time picking up voices when spoken at a normal or slightly less than normal! It also seems to not pickup wireless signals as well as a regular Dot? Not sure why but when you say the wake up word (Alexa, Echo, Google), it acts like it does not know what to do, so it just does nothing? I clock portion of the unit is great! Bright, dimm, and self adjusting as per light needs, HOWEVER, if the power goes out, your alarm is S.O.L.!!! Would LOVE to be able to make my own wakup name, instead of 3 predefined ones I really don't want to use!!!
customer_reviews.author: RD

customer_reviews.title: Poor attempt to boost bass ruins overall quality of sound.
customer_reviews.text: I feel this device was engineered in attempt to make it sound bass-heavy, but instead it sounds like you're listening to music being played underwater. The treble is decreased in attempt to boost the bass. Even adjusting the audio quality to decrease bass and increase treble in the Alexa settings does nothing to improve sound quality. If listening to music with someone singing, the actual words are barely understandable. You have to blast the volume just to make out anything a person is singing or saying.
customer_reviews.author: deepsoul13

customer_reviews.title: As Expected
customer_reviews.text: Product as expected and working just fine. No issues pairing with device. Set up in less than 5 minutes. I like being able to have music where I am, so I now have three Dots, plus Fire TV. All good. Speaker is fine for the price (don't expect high end sound) but it can be paired with a bluetooth speaker-which I have, but haven't tried pairing as of yet. I can't imagine it would be difficult to do. I find that Alexa understands my Boston accent better than Siri!! Now, I wish we could pick an accent and male voice option....yea, I know Amazon, Alexa is your gal, but maybe some folks want an Irish brogue Alex instead! :-)
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Great for what it is
customer_reviews.text: Don’t expect great sound quality, but, aside from that, it responds well to the commands I give it. I’m relatively new to Alexa/Echo, but from what I can tell, it does fine. Its build quality seems high. AMAZON, THIS IS FOR YOU: IT WOULD BE REALLY GREAT IF YOU WOULD ALLOW CUSTOM “WAKE WORDS”. MAKE THESE (AND OTHER DEVICES IN THE PRODUCT LINE) RESPOND TO A WORD OR SOUND THE USER CAN SET UP. There must be some means to allow for this. “Alexa, change wake word”. “What would you like?” “Set wake word to BLARGLE”. “Wake word will set to BLARGLE after a few minutes.”
customer_reviews.author: Retired Viking

customer_reviews.title: Speech difficulties, no problem for Alexa
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my younger son, intended for amusement, however it turned into something more useful and and still fun. My son has speech difficulties however he realizes when speaking to Alexa he has to try a little harder to articulate, one example a word like "sergeant" my son would say "shergeant" as you guessed Alexa would ask him to repeat then we'll go on trying to correct it. Sometimes though Alexa would just go on providing him with the answer for questions asked with no regards to the speech patern. I think it's just Alexa EVOLVING TO RECOGNIZE HIS DISTINCT SPEECH PATERNS.
customer_reviews.author: FRENCHY

customer_reviews.title: Great clock/smart helper!
customer_reviews.text: I gave voice recognition a “3”, because these things NEVER recognize what I’m saying. LOL. However, other family members have no issue, so a “5” The clock is a great added feature, & it does have an auto-dimmer feature & senses when its night. It doesn’t get quite dim enough for me to sleep. So I just turn it away from me at night, not a biggie. The sound quality on this little puck is amazing! Almost like have a full on stereo system in a tiny circle! This is a great nightstand addition or if you need a clock/radio/smart helper in a small space.
customer_reviews.author: Nyanchan

customer_reviews.title: Very nice..
customer_reviews.text: I also have the Gen 1 Dot and there is no comparison between the two when it comes to sound quality. The integrated clock is a nice addition, but it's the sound quality that gets me. This one sounds just as nice as my Gen 2 Echo. Adding the Dot to the network was as simple as it gets. The new Dot also doesn't seem to eavesdrop like the Echo does. Or, it just doesn't show when it's eavesdropping. So, that's a plus. I would post a picture, but the new Dot is in my teenage daughter's room and that place is a disaster, so you'll just have to take my word for it. Overall, great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: A. D. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Echo Dot 3.5
customer_reviews.text: I'm enjoying this thing so far. I use it when I when out. When I perform a timed exercise it helps sometimes to have the clock on the speaker to look at. I would like it better if I could use YouTube music with it. I know, competing service. Another thing I would like to see worked on are podcasts. If I want to listen to a particular podcast out of a series, unless it's the first or last I have to keep telling it next episode or previous episode. Not a problem if there's just two or three but if there's a series of 10 or 15 it gets a bit tiresome. Overall I'm happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Black

customer_reviews.title: Good Solo, better in Pair
customer_reviews.text: I am still nervous about Alex listening in on me, but I love music. I have pairs set up in three rooms, and love the convenience. Although the dot is decent, TWO dots are more than twice as good. One thing that I have always hated about most blue tooth speakers is lack of dimension and separation. This has both. There is a real texture to the music. I do have two standard Alexa echos and a sub-woofer in the living room, and the sound is very good. Two dots is not nearly as good, but to answer the oft asked question... I think two dots (3rd gen) sound better than a single Alexa speaker (3rd gen).
customer_reviews.author: dynsight

customer_reviews.title: Love my Dot!
customer_reviews.text: After 336k reviews, who needs mine, right? I’m 71, not geeky and I purchased this Dot with the clock to make my new “smart” Samsung TV smarter. I’ll leave all the tech and smart home comments to those more qualified than me. I’ll just state, the Dot is smart, fun to use, plays Prime music and gets it right every time I ask it something. I agree with many others the sound is crappy even for an old lady like me. If it would jump off the table and grow up to be a Roomba, life would be perfect. Other than that, it’s the best $30 (Prime special with TV purchase) I’ve spent on electronics in years.
customer_reviews.author: LindaKTop Contributor: Calligraphy

customer_reviews.title: Saves time and energy!
customer_reviews.text: I had the Echo Dot in the living room, but my kids were constantly asking her to play music and random questions. Therefore, I moved it to my bedroom. It saves me from having to search for answers! Why search when I can simply ask Alexa. Why get up and turn appliances/devices off when with a simple voice command Alexa can turn off my smart devices. I can ask Alexa to play my playlist, the weather forecast, and so much more.The Echo Dot is definitely worth the price! I will eventually buy two more for my kid's rooms. Oh and this one displays the time.The volume and lights on it can be adjusted.
customer_reviews.author: tinaa40

customer_reviews.title: Echo Dot Obsession
customer_reviews.text: It's entirely possible that I have an Echo Dot obsession. I have more than I can count around the house, garage. Most connected to larger home audio setups. I had to get one of these with a clock for the bedroom. I love that you can dim the light on the clock or just allow it to adjust on its own using the ambient light of the room. Also shows temperature. I'd get another, but if my wife sees another Echo Dot come into the house, it's entirely possible that she'll collect all of them, throw them away, and insist that I go to therapy. ...so I think I'll leave it there for now :)
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: if you own the newest doth without the clock read me :)
customer_reviews.text: We got this to upgrade our newest dot. It looks the same but the clock one does in fact have a slightly better sound a touch more bass and treble and output just a tad more and the clock and temperature sensor made this a easy upgrade. Its worth it when on sale. We used the trade in program if you add the tiny gift card they give you plus the discount code for the new one you get about what you paid for original making this upgrade only a few dollars extra and TOTALLY WORTH IT. You get a slightly better sounding dot with a clock/alarm, temp sensor, and new device its a no brainier get it now.
customer_reviews.author: AudioPhile

customer_reviews.title: You'd be amazed at how much you'll like/want the one with the clock
customer_reviews.text: The clock, the clock, the clock. This little echo dot has everything the other echo dot has, but it has a little light level sensing, LED display that usually shows the clock. For someone who uses his phone to tell time, the echo dot with the clock makes the echo dot fit so nicely in the bedrooms. It goes from being just a Alexa conduit, to an alarm clock. To a countdown timer. To a regular timer. All very useful things when you're on a schedule. The sound is more than adequate. Its loud enough for most of our needs. And having the digital display of the sound level is another great little perk of the display.
customer_reviews.author: Ty Chau

customer_reviews.title: Alexa Echo Dot
customer_reviews.text: My son is going to be a freshman this year, I figured this Alexa would be great because it has a clock on it. He can set the alarm to wake up in the morning and keep track of time. I didn't realize how much my kids would love it. It's very user friendly. My 10 year old paired his voice to it, created a username, and changed Alexa to computer. So instead of saying, Alexa what time is it. He says, computer what time is it. I have a Google speaker and I honestly believe that Alexa is hands down better. I will be purchasing more because the one that I do have my kids are fighting over.
customer_reviews.author: aelsas

customer_reviews.title: Impressive Echo Dot
customer_reviews.text: This is my third Echo Dot, and it's the only one with the LED clock and weather feature. I thought it would be a great addition to my existing Echo Dot family, and I'm very pleased with it. One of its key features, that's probably accessible on my other Echo Dot's, is that, Alexa and I recite "The Lord's Prayer," each night before I go to bed. I'm so impressed by this Echo Dot that I plan on purchasing another one, sometime soon. I've always appreciated the sound quality, and various additions that Alexa can provide; including her jokes. However, the LED clock and weather display is a great feature to utilize on Echo Dot's, in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Nerdy Chic

customer_reviews.title: A true upgrade
customer_reviews.text: Put off upgrading my bedroom second generation Dot for quite a while. Didn’t think it would be worth it. Then my bedside clock crapped out and I needed a new one. This Dot with clock dipped to $39 with option to pay over three months without interest. I have to admit that the sound quality improvement is significant, no doubt the product on increased size allowing for enhanced internal components. The clock display is first rate while responding to ambient light conditions. This was a good buy. I’d recommend this as a great bedside clock and alarm system.
customer_reviews.author: David A. Holcomb

customer_reviews.title: Still learning, but great so far!
customer_reviews.text: I was apprehensive about purchasing an Amazon Alexa product. Lots of rumors running around out there. My alarm clock was one of those “do you remember these,” social networking posts. I then decided it was time to move up. Amazon had a prime day with the echo dot with clock on special. I got one, and love it! You can totally control what is saved on your Alexa app. I get the local weather through the Alexa Big Sky skill, other skills which are all free will do numerous things, read the Bible, calm my dog, read bedtime stories, meditation and many others. I’m still learning, and having fun!
customer_reviews.author: jfray

customer_reviews.title: So much better than older dots
customer_reviews.text: This is oh I don't know about our 7th little dot that we have in the house. This one replaced an ancient cd alarm clock radio that I had on my night stand for about 100 years. It's awesome. Controls my lights, spy's on me, and gives me the time. Love it. The sound quality is great and I highly recommend. Really love the Amazon products. My one complaint is now when the Buick commercial comes on and says "Alex turn off my lights" this little bugger picks up on it and turns all the damn lights in the house off! It was really funny the first time it happened.
customer_reviews.author: Native Texan

customer_reviews.title: An Echo Dot with a clock!
customer_reviews.text: We already had a dot in our bedroom, which worked great to turn off our lights after we got into bed, play music, answer random questions, check the weather, etc. But..... after my husband's alarm clock stopped working, he started asking Alexa in the middle of the night what time it was. This woke me up. I saw this new dot with a clock in it and jumped on it. We needed a dot in the guest room anyway, so I got this one to replace our room's dot. He loves it! It has a lovely white backlit clock and works the same way otherwise as our other dot. Thanks for the innovation Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: GiniK

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up, smart & elegant
customer_reviews.text: I'm new to Alexa, so was a bit apprehensive it might be a challenge to set up. Was surprised how easy it was. Once you download the Amazon Alexa app & connect to your Wifi & power up Echo dot, the app's step by step instructions guide you through the set up. I'm yet to connect to other Alexa compatible devices. I bought & installed a Outlet Shelf by Echogear from Amazon that was used to dock my Echo dot (see video). Voice commands are taken easily once dot hears the word Alexa. The 3rd gen looks very elegant. Only the Greystone color has the clock/temp display. Hope this initial review was helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Musawir Karim

customer_reviews.title: The clock is genius
customer_reviews.text: I really didn't need another Echo device. My house is saturated with them. However, I did need a clock that was easy to read across the room. So, I bought this to replace on of my other Echo Dots. Sound quality and voice recognition are very good. The bass output is better than the old Echo Dot it replaced. The clock is easy to see. I have it near a television and can read it across the room. I could also see this making a good nightstand clock. It'd be interesting if other uses for the LEDs are in the device. I haven't tried any but a timer would be a no-brainer.
customer_reviews.author: Steakman

customer_reviews.title: Don't know how I functioned without her!
customer_reviews.text: I like that Alexa recognizes a conversational mode. I automatically say "thank you" to her, and she responds with various things with follow up. Other times, she's not so smart. Unlike Google Home, she doesn't know what to do when I explain that Lukey is my dog, so she doesn't give me dog-related content. Also, when I've tried to backtrack to a tip she had given me, she doesn't understand what I'm asking. I then end up Googling it. But the Amazon integration is well worth it, since she works with my music and Kindle books. I love her a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Cavanaugh

customer_reviews.title: Loses connection daily
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what's wrong with it, probably pushed out into production too early. Love the idea. It would be awesome if it worked. It started losing connection with the internet a few weeks after I installed it. It tells me to look at the help, there is no advice. I have four other echos, they mostly work fine. Its something with this design. I would not recommend buying it until they release version 2.
customer_reviews.author: User One

customer_reviews.title: EZ setup
customer_reviews.text: This is the first Alexa add-on that is truly plug and play. No settings, no messing with pairings, no back and forth with WiFi. Plug it in, leave it alone for about a minute, and if you already have Alexa set up, then this one sets itself. Vast improvement over frustrating and time wasting setups of previous models. Sound is good for its size but very bassy, but you can tell Alexa to turn down the treble and it equalizes. Sweet. The clock readout automatically dims in dark conditions so it is not annoying while tying to sleep. I want two more.
customer_reviews.author: Professor Movie

customer_reviews.title: Small but impressive...
customer_reviews.text: Full disclosure, I love all my echo speakers. I have an Echo Plus, a couple of classic Echos, a Show5, a Fire Cube, and now the Echo Dot with the clock. For such a small footprint, the echo plus has a great sound. I purchased the Echo Dot because we wanted another speaker for a smaller room. The size and price were perfect. And it only takes a few minutes to get your new Echo speaker connected to the rest of the house. I love having music throughout the entire house with no special setup or complex cords. I definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Reid McCormick

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has been on me for over a year to buy one of these but I'm OLD fashion and just kept using my cell phone with bad reception to listen to music on youtube when I am in the pool. Since I bought this, I can ask for any music I want and the reception is great and NO adds and I can ask it how long a song is or who sung it or when it was released and more. I will start to use it for more things as time goes on. THANKS
customer_reviews.author: William Aversa

customer_reviews.title: I can't believe how good the voice recognition is.
customer_reviews.text: Even when I wake up in the morning with a dry mouth and speaking gibberish Alexa still understands me. I think her ability to understand people's voices surpasses the average human! So far I'm just touching the tip of the iceberg as far as testing her capabilities but for the miniscule price I paid for the dot I'm highly impressed with her ability to tell me about traffic, the weather, the news, & playing good music based on what I request. So, I'm just a beginner but I have to admit that thus far I'm very impressed & enjoying my Dot.
customer_reviews.author: Zylgis Zaldapheus

customer_reviews.title: Interfere with security cameras
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to give these a better review because they work well, but our Arlo security cameras have had issues since adding these to our home. We placed them in the girls rooms upstairs, the security cameras are just outside these locations by the garage, only a few feet away. They seem to be competing for WiFi signal and are interfering, cameras don’t activate/record when motion detected. We unplugged the echo devices and now cameras are back to normal. Unfortunately we won’t be able to use these.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Nice Unit but too Bright at Night
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to put on the night stand but it is too bright even at its lowest setting. You can turn the display off but that defeats the purpose of having the clock. I ended up buying a 3rd gen Echo and a regular alarm clock with adjustable brightness (see link below) and that works well. I will be moving this unit into the bathroom. It is a nice unit and I think it looks attractive. Here is a link to the clock I bought (amber color). It is great for sleepers who are light sensitive.
customer_reviews.author: Scott C.

customer_reviews.title: Practical to Have!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my Father-in-Law for Father’s Day. He is a pain in the butt and calls for anything, even with his SmartPhone. My husband and I are hoping this Alexa will help him stop calling as much! As well as provide entertainment for him, he is alone a lot at night while his wife works. I purchased the digital clock version for him, which is practical for a man in his 60s, decorative as well. Simple to use and set up, even if you don’t plan on purchasing music or a subscription, Echo Dot is practical for any household with many free options to use.
customer_reviews.author: 𝔅𝔯𝔦

customer_reviews.title: Randomly turns on and picks up outside noise. Frequently unlinks to Spotify.
customer_reviews.text: I gave this Alexa 3.5 stars for the clock that they added but there are some technical issues even worse then previous generations. It picks up any kind of talking randomly. It doesn’t even have to remotely sound like Alexa and it just responds...weird?! Also now that amazon has their own music playing application this Alexa constantly unlinks itself to my Spotify account. It’s such a pain. I use Alexa on a daily and sometimes it doesn’t even recognize what people are asking it to do or it does but nothing will happen. They need to fix this if they want to keep customers.
customer_reviews.author: C&M

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: First I have to say thank you Amazon because it came prepped and it saying directly to my Wi-Fi along with my other Alexa devices and plugs in the house. This speaker is much louder than the generation two, I love that it shows you what time it is and if you set an alarm you get a little dot on the right hand side. You also can name your devices and call room to room like you’re using an intercom. There are so many things I love about this product I could go on and on but mainly I love it for the alarm value. And listening to Music around my house
customer_reviews.author: Brooke McKibbin

customer_reviews.title: Nice Feature
customer_reviews.text: This Echo Dot 3rd Generation is as described on Amazon. The sandstone color is a good neutral tone for any room, and the clock is a nice feature for anywhere one is needed. The Echo Dot was easy to set up with the Amazon Alexa App. So if you have one dot, it’s easy for the skills to be integrated into this one. My wife loves playing music on this dot as she’s getting ready for work, or doing tasks around the house. I really like it too. The voice recognition is great and the sound quality is just as great. If you need an Echo Dot, this one’s for you.
customer_reviews.author: D.R. Richey

customer_reviews.title: Glad I Upgraded
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this echo dot (3rd generation) as an upgrade to the one I had. The sound quality is greatly improved the first thing I noticed. My older echo dot is still in use. The setup was easier than my first dot. I also use it as a sound machine at night and the choices are many. Love the fan sounds - helps me sleep much better. I like the option to turn the microphone off. Many are paranoid that they are being recorded and listened to or hacked by a third party. This gives the user some control and maybe a level of comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Happy girl!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I wanted a clock/radio for my bedroom. This is perfect and has so many more options than the "old clock radio" (anyone remember 1985?). I can set my alarm, listen to music, SHOP (don't tell my husband that), talk to "someone" that actually listens (don't tell my husband that either), and so much more that I'll probably have to ask Alexa to give me ideas for. I especially like that the clock light auto-dims when it's dark. I was a bit worried about the darkness in my room (I like it pitch black). I'm a happy girl!
customer_reviews.author: Erica B.

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use as an alarm in my son’s bedroom. We set up routines to play music to wake him daily at a specific time (routines are more customizable). The problem is the routines are unreliable and often don’t work. After googling the problem I see it’s a common complaint on the devices. We’re going to try alarms instead. But the reason we got this device is that standard alarms don’t seem to wake him.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Hickman

customer_reviews.title: Almost there..
customer_reviews.text: Clock is a great addition, and obvious improvement. The only thing things is... If you use it for an alarm clock you still have to talk to Alexa to turn off the alarm. You can snooze with the action button, but actually turn it off. And while the alarm is obviously designed to wake you up, your voice talking to Alexa can be more of a wake up for your bed partner. An off button option would be an improvement one step more.
customer_reviews.author: opie0516

customer_reviews.title: Love all she does but...
customer_reviews.text: Just ordered my first Echo and will be watching for more price drops to add more throughout the house along with more smart plugs. As a senior with tinnitus, my major complaint is understanding what she is saying. She is so muffled that I mostly have to use the app on the phone to figure out what's going on and ask only questions she can answer with only a few words. Any background noise from the room like the TV or fan make it nearly impossible. From my understanding, adding external speakers might help with music but not with dialogue.
customer_reviews.author: Kathie, GA

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Happy
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Echo Dot to replace a radio/Alarm clock that NEVER had the correct time and the sound was horrible!! I LOVE the Echo Dot..I like being able to tell it what Im wanting to hear and the clock (the real reason I bought it) is perfect!!! BUT like everything its not 100% perfect not often but sometimes I have a hard time getting it to turn on..But its usually my fault because Im not the best communicator even with a gadget! All that said Im buying another for my son for Christmas!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lillian

customer_reviews.title: A handy bed side companion
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a device that I could simple tell what time I wanted to wake and what I wanted to be awaken to. It is great if you are in bed and want a different radio station, or music or news, I don't have to get up or even move, I simply say what I want. It also automatically moves the time on the clock ahead or back according to the season. No more fiddling with the time set. What could improve is the size of the numbers on the clock and perhaps a way to project the time and temperature on the ceiling for easier viewing. Otherwise it is great.
customer_reviews.author: joseph R. Schlauch

customer_reviews.title: Nice upgrade from the 2nd generation
customer_reviews.text: Got this to replace our Echo Dot 2. We wanted something with a clock and so this fit the bill. A bit larger and heavier and seemed more robust than the previous plasticky Dot. While the plug is larger, I did appreciate that it allowed for a lower profile, as the previous USB cable was inserted perpendicular to the wall- whereas this cable which is not USB but fixed, is parallel to the wall. The sound though not as good as our Echos is a huge noticeable improvement over the previous Dot. More bass and less teeny. Overall very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: TKK

customer_reviews.title: This device is the maximum 👍
customer_reviews.text: It's my first Echo Dot (3rd Gen) with clock, it's small, it has a fantastic speaker and it sounds hard, it's easy to set up, my daughters have loved it so much that now they want me to buy them one, sometimes Alexa doesn't understand the instructions well in Spanish when both girls talk at the same time, if you talk to Alexa calmly will do what you ask, it stays a little short of skills to integrate, but overall, it's perfect, I recommend it. The bad news is that in Panama, I can't connect my Spotify Premium account, but nothing that other apps can't solve.
customer_reviews.author: Lilka E. Munoz

customer_reviews.title: Not consistent!waste of $$$
customer_reviews.text: I hate this thing! She never works, it’s one thing or another with it, seriously not worth the issues it comes with, there’s no point to having this thing if it never works correctly go with goggle one instead seemed to work 99.8% of the time compared to this price of junk that works only .3% of the time & still can’t fix the issues, obviously not worth your money spend it else ware I hate Alexa!!
customer_reviews.author: Malissa2200

customer_reviews.title: Best digital clock I've ever had by far.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know for months that I could change the clock brightness via the Alexa app, but once I did I was like "Ahhh! That IS SO MUCH better!" Now it completely makes sense. At first, I thought "meh", but it's actually a nice clock, especially since you'll never need to set it or have to worry about it being wrong, running out of batteries, etc. And if you still wanted you could always couple Echo Wall Clock with it. Wish you could change the display COLOR, but I ask for a lot sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Russell

customer_reviews.title: Expecting it could be more
customer_reviews.text: All the specifications and descriptions are true nonetheless, I was expecting that it would display more. It is the same Echo Dot Gen 3 that I have with the extra of the display., yet having only one color available makes it looks like the Model T (I think) Ford made when you could have it any color as long it was black. If the display was scrolling and had the ability to change color or have it a graphical display so I could see a rain-forest when listening to the sound, or see the weather as well as hear it... Perhaps in a future Gen? :)
customer_reviews.author: Gregorio Padin

customer_reviews.title: What the Dot Should Always Have Been.
customer_reviews.text: What are the most common question asked to Alexa? I bet it's "what's the time." I like having that little clock there. I also like being able to see the current temperature as it is displayed, and having visual timers. And setting an alarm clock by just talking at Alexa? Heck yeah. So, only down tick I think is the auto dimming feature. It dims down far too low for me to even see at night. I wish I could set threshold values rather than have Alexa use whatever 'model' it currently uses. I bough Google Home Mini's as gifts for others in the past, but this is the first voice assistant I purchased for myself.
customer_reviews.author: tjs114

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy mine. Only thing I wished when I bought it is that it came in the color black. Other than that, this thing is very good and made even better by buying the base power pack for sale here on Amazon that allows you to tote it throughout the house untethered from power. I really enjoy the clock feature. The only device I'm using it with now is a powerstrip for my studio lighting in my office for game streaming. Works wonderfully with that. I've owned 4 previous version echo's and this is by far my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: metagamerx

customer_reviews.title: Small setup snafu
customer_reviews.text: I own 2 other Alexa Dots, but when this one went on a Flash Sale, I decided to get it for my craft room. Had some issues with setup. I reached out to chat support and they very patiently held my hand and walked me through several steps before instructing me on how to hard reboot my device. (It wasn't broadcasting its wifi network.) The hard reboot forced it to update its software. It actually auto set up (because I had other devices on set up on my network.) It was a bit frustrating that it didn't come out of the box and just work, but I really appreciated the Chat Tech Support getting it up and running with me!
customer_reviews.author: Ananda S.

customer_reviews.title: time wheather /songs sung. / rain when I go to sleep/ love it
customer_reviews.text: Want one in every bedroom. My husband has taken my orginal tall Alexa. So I read and looked and took a chance on this one because I needed a clock and wake up in my bed room. It does so much more then that put you to sleep with soothing sounds /talks to you when you ask a question. reads books sings etc etc. I give it 5 stars easily. I am a apple fan / but have started to buy amazon Alexa and purchased a tablet gifted it to grand daughter . great buy PS As you can see I need to order the stand it goes in.
customer_reviews.author: pamela Brown

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Bedroom Device. Keeps perfect time & can wake you up to music.
customer_reviews.text: This is my third Dot added, and the coolest one yet, besides my big Alexa. The illuminated time on the side of it makes it easy to see, night or day. I keep it on my nightstand by the bed, and can use it for a wake up alarm, tell the time, and best of all, listen to a wide realm of music that I can choose. Awesome version of the Dot and it works perfectly & sounds great. I would highly recommend this product. This is my 3rd Dot so far, and won't be my last. I've got a few more locations in my house that would be great places for another Dot. Great Product from Amazon!! Too Cool!
customer_reviews.author: David R. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Alexa has changed my life.
customer_reviews.text: Originally, I bought an Alexa Dot, then realizing how much it can do, I realized, one was not enough. I wanted the clock for my living room, so I could easily have the time displayed, so I got this one. Alexa is always there, answering questions, performing tasks for me. What I like most about Alexa is when she does not recognize a command, I can go look to hear what she heard. Out of all the voice technology I have ever used, Alexa does it right all the time. I can't imagine a life without Alexa in my house now. I just wish more things had Alexa built in.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin H.

customer_reviews.title: Echo Dot is Great, Echo Dot with Clock is Everything
customer_reviews.text: The Echo Dot's tiny footprint is perfect, the unobtrusive hockey puck look is clean, Alexa is amazing, etc. Read other reviews for all the good stuff about the Echo Dot. What blows me away is how much I love the simple addition of the clock! 100% a game changer in how well I sleep, how little I pick up my phone and get distracted from sleeping if I wake up in the middle of the night and decide to check the time. Yes I could have had a light sensing backlit alarm clock the whole time, but I didn't know I was missing out til this came around. Well done Amazon👏🏼 It's the little things.
customer_reviews.author: ckill3

customer_reviews.title: A Great Alarm Clock and a Medium Voice Assistant
customer_reviews.text: When they released an Echo Dot with a clock I was very pleased, because I had been using a Dot as an Alarm clock for about a year by that time. And this works just like an older Dot, but I've noticed the voice recognition isn't as great as the previous models. Unless I'm close and facing this Echo Dot I have to speak so loud that my older Dot in the other bedroom picks it up as well. I really like that if I set a timer the LED counts down. It sounds great, but I have mostly paired it with an external speaker. It's a good Echo Dot, but it needs some work on the pickup microphone.
customer_reviews.author: Daran C. Grissom

customer_reviews.title: Too Cool!
customer_reviews.text: Sooo, on Black Friday, 2017 I bought an Alexa Echo, 1st gen. It sat faithfully under my desk, unopened until last month when I decided to try it out. IT'S SO COOL! I never knew how much you can do with it. I now own 5 dots scattered through the house & am loving it! Wifey does to, it understands her perfectly even though she has a fairly heavy accent. Alexa, set an alarm for 5:00 am tomorrow. Set a timer for 30 minutes. Play Braid Paisley music. On & on. I might wind up needing a support group.
customer_reviews.author: Regularguy

customer_reviews.title: Replaced my Alarm Clock and Much More
customer_reviews.text: This little device has replaced quite a few older, outdated tech devices in my home. It sits on my nightstand and serves as my bedroom clock, alarm clock, weather reporter, music player - and actually a whole lot more. I'm in the process of integrating some smart lights and smart plugs, but that's a bit more difficult than it should be. I found syncing my iPhone was much easier. Anyway, I'm pleased and impressed with this product and am looking forward to discovering what else it can do.
customer_reviews.author: Rex

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition
customer_reviews.text: I got one of these for my bathroom so I could get rid of my wife clock and still see the time without asking Alexa for the time. It was the absolutely best decision. I especially like that the screen brightness adjust automatically to ambient light, great for late night bathroom visits. You can even make it a night light by turning off the ambient mode. Like every other echo, set up is a breeze. And if you have an Amazon account, simple have the set it for you so all you have to do is plug and play
customer_reviews.author: Dalton

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My wife bought me this for Christmas. It's great, the speaker is so much better than past versions. In fact, we have a smart speaker hooked up to another echo in our bathroom, and when I play music on both at the same time, the sound that comes from this little dot is so much better than the bigger speaker. I love the clock. It's a little small (I'm nearsighted) and I have to squint to read it at night, but it's great otherwise. Dims when I turn off the light - nice touch Amazon! They might be spying on me, but I love the Echos we have!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Won't integrate with the other Amazon products
customer_reviews.text: Bought 3 Alexa Echo devices [same type] and a Fire stick 4K so that all would connect and could be used throughout the house and outside. When they actually do connect they will read one page of a book then stop. The app keeps showing that they are trying to connect. If I attempt any voice command during that time Alexa says 'hmm I don't understand' then continues on reading the one page. I've followed all the instructions and help guides/information Amazon puts out and anything else I can find on the internet. Nothing works. Don't buy multi Echo/Amazon devices if expecting them to integrate... they won't.
customer_reviews.author: SP

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price point, better options out there.
customer_reviews.text: This is an okay device. It does have its limitations. The google brand similar product has better integration for my bilingual family. The echo dot has muffled sound the higher the volume. Amazon has a lot more privacy policy terms that I don’t necessarily agree with to use the device. I wouldn’t have purchased this at its current price if I didn’t get it through an offer which significantly reduced the cost.
customer_reviews.author: DeeVeeBzz

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality is A+++
customer_reviews.text: After a slow learning curve, I have grown to really like Alexa. She has kept me on track with my getting up and moving every two hours -- sometimes I think she is a little pushy, but that is because I don't want to get up!! I will say that the sound quality is very very impressive, whether streaming online service or playing music loaded in my phone, I have been very happy with the quality of the speaker. If you are looking at this little dot, I highly recommend it, you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Heather M

customer_reviews.title: Packs a huge punch!
customer_reviews.text: We have 2 other Echos, a "big one," and another dot. Our other dot is a 1st generation, and this 3rd generation is jaw droppingly better than our 1st generation! We were amazed. We are strongly considering getting 2 more dots instead of the bigger ones, because the sound is THAT good compatibly! We also like the clock feature, which is the main reason why we got this one. Sure it would be nice to have more customization with that, but the sound quality makes up for those losses. A GREAT little machine!
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Great at my bedside!
customer_reviews.text: I replaced a bulky, decades-old clock radio with the small and fun Echo Dot. I ask for relaxing music (piano tunes) while preparing for bed each night; ask for the music to stop playing in 20 minutes after going to bed; and ask to be awakened to music at a specific time in the morning. I'm a music lover and appreciate falling asleep to melodies, knowing Alex will turn off automatically. A small but very nice feature is the way the digital time, which is lit up on the side of the Dot, dims to a "sleep level" as soon as I turn the lights out. Lots of convenience and enjoyment for a small price! Jo in Camarillo
customer_reviews.author: Jo in Camarillo

customer_reviews.title: Bedside clock you can talk to
customer_reviews.text: We have four other Echo devices in the house. This one I bought to use on a bedside table replacing a simple Echo dot (which has moved to the office). It works well and the same as its mates. Easy to tell the time at a glance in the middle of the night when the cat wants to go out. It has an unexpected and welcome feature -- when you turn out the lights in the room it will automatically dim the time display so it can be seen but is not too bright. When it is daylight, the display brightens again. Clever.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Upgrade to the Little Dot
customer_reviews.text: We have a bunch of Alexas in the house and at the office, but I wanted to get this one for my Dad, as I knew he would love having it in the bedroom. The clock is easy to read, but not too bright at night and the sound is perfect for one room where you want to listen to music, news or stories. (Tip: It will show you the temperature where the clock is when you ask about the weather or temp) It won't rock out as hard as the big ones but has a good sound quality and big enough to easily fill the whole room. He loves it and turned out to be a perfect birthday gift.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Kollman

customer_reviews.title: Super convenient
customer_reviews.text: I love the convenience of having a dot in my living room. I can start music while doing chores without having to stop. I like the notification option for package deliveries. My daughter absolutely loves to ask Alexa questions and listen to her songs. Sometimes she goes a little wonky when I ask her to do something she has done previously, like opening a Pandora station. But for the price is pretty good. I also love having the time in the living room since we aren't really clock people.
customer_reviews.author: Chrisi41

customer_reviews.title: Alarm Clock
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new alarm. The dot takes up little room on my night stand. The clock auto dims nicely according to the light in the room. I haven't used any alarm sound except the default and it wakes me up. Has a nice sound. My old alarm clock was oversized and had such an annoying buzzer. I am happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Wow. I am so happy I bought this. We needed a new clock for the kitchen. Looking at clocks retailing for $12 we decided to take the $30 leap&have this for playing music on demand while cooking. Yes, there are obscure songs you will not get for free, but it has almost everything else available. The best part is how much my older parents use it. (I bought them one also) They do not use technology much, and they really enjoy yelling at it. Volume also goes real loud for my dad's hard of hearing. Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this for me for Christmas. It was a nice surprise. I like the clock, especially that the brightness is adjustable. The sound quality is very good. The only drawback for me is that the directions are not very good. They are so busy telling you all the complicated things that Alexa can do that they forgot to tell you what it means when it is flashing green. It took me 24 hours and 3 websites before I figured out that it meant that I had a message. That is a very simple thing that should have been included in the instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Alexa Is Santa Too
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my wife at Christmas. Our first voice activated smart home device. Set up was easy if not a little tedious. Since our iPhone 10 Max has rejected the Alexa app. No big deal since the device works, but interesting that the siri vs alexa war rages on. My wife has adapted to it and now I hear music coming from the master bedroom most every morning. While her 1960s era Zenith clock radio is still on her night stand, it hasn't been used for either wake up calls or easy listening. And she thinks it is 'cute'. Always a good thing. Eh?
customer_reviews.author: MikeS in OV AZ

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Two thumbs up!!
customer_reviews.text: We are enjoying this product so much. Both my boys ages 11 and 13 love playing games with Alexa and listening to music on this device. I play games on this device with my kids, listen to news music etc, set timers and alarms, can easily check the weather, etc. and of course we love asking Alexa just random questions. Love this product! Edited to add: I am so disappointed that I can’t listen to YouTube on this device. Amazon, please please please add a YouTube skill for Alexa!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Amazing device!
customer_reviews.text: We have 6 of these in our home. I love them! The kids can listen to music, listen to audio books, turn lights on and off, talk to each other in other rooms and ask Alexa questions like “What’s the weather?, What time is it?, What’s 12 x 42?, How many days until Christmas?” etc. I find myself driving in my car trying to ask Alexa a question and then sadly realizing I don’t have Alexa in my car. It’s become such an integrated part of our lives and now I can’t imagine life without these conveniences.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality Item Replacement Alarm Clock
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Amazon Alexa with clock. I was able to get rid of the bulky alarm clock on my over crowded night stand. The only complaint I have about this device and it applies to all for Echo dots (Alexa in general) is we use them for “Brown noise” to sleep. We ask to play brown noise and then loop. Yet, about every other night the Echo Dot just stops playing and you wake at some point the middle of the morning with it off. One in another room plays all night so it isn’t the Internet. Outside of this - definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: LEROY TITMAN

customer_reviews.title: Won't stop making sounds and cannot get support
customer_reviews.text: This device is driving me insane. I use it for an alarm. I know how to to turn the alarm off. However, every once in a while after I turn the alarm off, it starts playing the simple alarm sound. I cannot get it to stop. Pressing the button, telling it to stop does not work. The only way is to unplug it or wait an hour. I am getting tired of unplugging it. Try to get support is worse, there is no number or choice that I can find if you have an issue with the actual product.
customer_reviews.author: P. V. Cleave

customer_reviews.title: I was hesitant at buying this, but....
customer_reviews.text: After reading reviews about people saying that the product wasn't that great or defective, I was a bit hesitant, but I decided to bite the bullet... Suprisingly, I was BLOWN AWAY. Amazon Alexa is amazing and it changed my life. Initially, I boughr one just so I could turn off my light at night. Due to the purchase, I ended up buying smart plugs and lights to turn my room into a smartroom. Alexa is amazing, and for anyone who has never had a smart product like Alexa, definitely do it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Moua

customer_reviews.title: Love my Dots
customer_reviews.text: I have four echo dots. One for each of us. Then I will use them all together around the pool with the Alexa app. I will find that randomly one or two of them will just stop playing. I have not quite figured out the how or the why they become unsynched but it then becomes a big hassle to sync them all back together and Alex will say - music is playing on another device. Still trying to figure out those idiosyncrasies and find myself yelling "alexa" a lot. But, we do enjoy them.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is a great alarm clock with an easy-to-see time display, day or night - I now wake up to the music I like and can get the weather report and news of the day while still in bed. The sound quality is truly amazing. It sounds like a much larger speaker system. It also works with my other devices set up on Alexa, so I can turn lights, appliances, etc. on and off from my bedroom. And, the price is a real bargain for all it can do. Couldn't be more pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jack21

customer_reviews.title: Echo Dot 3rd Generation
customer_reviews.text: I am mostly pleased with my purchase of the 3rd Generation Echo Dot. It integrates well with our other Alexa-compatible devices. It looks much nicer than the 2nd Generation hockey pucks. And, the digital clock makes it functional even when it's just sitting there. My only negative concerns the sound quality. While it is much improved over the 2nd Generation dot, it still seems bass-heavy and murky to my ears. A Bluetooth-attached speaker remedies that situation. I guess I should have paid the extra money and bought an Echo Plus.
customer_reviews.author: R.H.

customer_reviews.title: Nice self dimming clock.
customer_reviews.text: Nice self dimming clock.Still learning the in and outs of pairing with other devices.Overall good interaction. would like to personalize voice / name association, want to change voice assigned name to a family known/friendly name. I still may be able to do this but would be nice if was as easy as a voice command to alexa, she does not want to forget my voice to reprogram it again with my new chosen name.Really not a big deal just voicing some thoughts.Also im new to Alexa and may still find a way to do some more - as I learn or Alexa learns.
customer_reviews.author: PopsE

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding integration with existing Echo hub
customer_reviews.text: The clock is great! My eyesight is slowly deteriorating (I'm in my 60s) and the clock is easily viewed at night, even at the dimmest setting. This was purchased to replace my Kindle Fire HD8 tablet in the bedroom - the Alexa integration in the Kindle tablet lacks some functionality (hardware limitations) and the Echo Dot overcomes that. The Echo hub is in the living room and the Echo Dot is in the bedroom. Occasionally, the hub responds when I'm in the bedroom, but I think that's a selectivity issue, remedied by placement.
customer_reviews.author: Gregg Cure

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I really love this echo dot! It is very compact so its sits nice on my crowded night stand. It does lots of things, for example; plays games, music, gives the weather, and more. Very impressed with my purchase! I plan on purchasing another one for my mom for Christmas as she liked mine so much.
customer_reviews.author: Mysterious outlook

customer_reviews.title: Barely a good enough sound for a small bedrooms Functionality is oversold.
customer_reviews.text: Functions are just "Ok". Certainly NOT worth the price paid. I have 3 devices. Alexa cannot distinguish between them when giving commands to play music in a particular room NOR play "Everywhere", same music on all 3 devices. I have Googled and implemented the solutions I found, only for the problems to continue. Alexa's functionality is oversold and at the rate of improvements, still has another 3 to 4 years of development to go before Alexa performs as advertised today. The need to remember specific phrase makes this item a PIA to use. No Bluetooth music streaming to all Echos. This is too expensive what what it does.
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: I like the clock. All Dots could be better.
customer_reviews.text: Regular Dot but with a clock and additional alarm features. Still frequently misunderstands commands, sometimes comically, always frustratingly. Still HORRIBLE sound quality and using the EQ has little effect. The voice responses are always muddy and a detriment to anyone with less than perfect hearing. The only way to compensate is to turn the volume up to an uncomfortable level. I’m heavily invested in the Echo system and it’s too late to turn back but if I were starting over I’d check into the sound quality of Google first before choosing.
customer_reviews.author: Firelance8015

customer_reviews.title: Love the Quality
customer_reviews.text: We've had a Dot forever but decided to upgrade to one with a clock. I love this little Dot. The sound quality is so improved and the Alexa App includes sound adjustments of the bass, treble, etc. The light on the clock can be adjusted and there is a feature which allows the light to adjust automatically according to the ambient light. When we ask for the current temperature, it is shown on the dial. When our alarm goes off, we can either tell Alexa to snooze or stop or we can tap the top of the Dot. This is a great unit. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: C. Hall

product_meta.title: Echo Dot (3rd Gen) - Smart speaker with clock and Alexa - Sandstone
feature_bullets: Our most popular smart speaker - Now available with an LED display that can show the time, outdoor temperature, or timers.
Perfect for your nightstand - Ask Alexa to set an alarm. Tap the top to snooze. The light sensor automatically adjusts the display’s brightness, day or night.
Voice control your music - Stream songs from Amazon Music, Apple Music, Spotify, Sirius XM, and others. You can also listen to audiobooks from Audible.
Enjoy stereo sound - Pair with a second Echo Dot for rich, stereo sound. Fill your home with music with compatible Echo devices in different rooms.
Ready to help - Ask Alexa to play music, answer questions, read the news, check the weather, set alarms, control compatible smart home devices, and more.
Voice control your smart home - Turn on lights, adjust thermostats, lock doors, and more with compatible connected devices.
Alexa has skills - With tens of thousands of skills and counting, Alexa is always getting smarter and adding new skills like tracking fitness, playing games, and more.
Designed to protect your privacy - Built with multiple layers of privacy controls, including a microphone off button that electronically disconnects the mics.
